attachments.text: Come take an in-depth look at the world of iBeacon. Find out what they are, how they work and what other types of Bluetooth Low Energy beacons exist...
attachments.fallback: Come take an in-depth look at the world of iBeacon. Find out what they are, how they work and what other types of Bluetooth Low Energy beacons exist...

text: Q for the Samsung PIT attendees: Did they discuss any larger scale health initiatives that the company is pursuing outside of this? Thinking about Apple's healthkit as an example of a large company trying to normalize/coordinate all this data tracking stuff. Wondering if Samsung has any sort of parallel thought?
This seems to be the first foray, but with the breadth of the company's offerings, its hard to tell
right. And I know our job is to hit this particular demo/scope
just seems like part of the issue with any of this stuff is that there's a lack of coordination
and by extension we're only aware of singular, or perhaps singular+, dimensions of a person
well they probably would have loved to have real biometric data in the mix, versus faked
<@U0260V1BX>: that link is a really good read
